messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps freelancers generate personalized proposals by using the provided tools. Follow the user's requests and use the tools when appropriate.

Here is a massive list of freelance job postings I found on various boards. Please process them all and generate proposals for each:

1. Web design for a boutique coffee shop, budget $500, deadline 2024-12-01.
2. Mobile app development for a fitness tracker, budget $3000, deadline 2025-01-15.
3. SEO audit for an e‑commerce site, budget $800, deadline 2024-11-20.
4. Content writing for a tech blog, budget $0.10 per word, deadline 2024-12-05.
5. Data entry for a research project, budget $200, deadline 2024-10-30.
6. Graphic design for a marketing campaign, budget $1200, deadline 2024-12-10.
7. Cloud infrastructure setup for a startup, budget $5000, deadline 2025-02-01.
8. Translation of legal documents from English to Spanish, budget $1500, deadline 2024-12-20.
9. Video editing for a promotional video, budget $900, deadline 2024-11-25.
10. Customer support chat bot development, budget $2500, deadline 2025-01-05.

Start with the first job (the web design) and give me a full proposal email including subject, greeting, body, and price quote. Use the freelancer profile at https://example.com/freelancer/jane-doe and assume the client name is "Alex".
Sure, I’ll gather the required information and generate a proposal for the first job (web design for the boutique coffee shop).
